title: Spacious studio in the heart of downtown, Capitol Park area
posting_body: Spacious studio in the heart of downtown, Capitol Park area.
The apartment is right across Woodward from San Morello, at the corner of Grand River & Woodward.
Tenant Pays for electric and internet separately.
Valet parking is available for an extra fee but I recommend a monthly parking arrangement at the Comerica garage as it is more cost effective :)
This studio is the best value for the money in the heart of downtown.
I know because I've shopped every single option thoroughly!
The only reason I am leaving is I have rented a house with some roommates just a couple of miles away.
My lease isn't up until November 15 but the building will allow a lease to be transferred from me to a new tenant before then.
Walkability score is a 10 and the Qline and people mover stops are all less than 2 blocks away.
I've attached some pictures of furniture in different configurations to showcase the use of the space.
